de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.server

Interface IServerMonitor


  • public interface IServerMonitor
    Is used in connection with eMails which are monitored.
    was:
    ServerMonitor.java

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PARAM_MONITOR_ACTION
      To control whether the mail may be sent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HashMap<String,Object> postMonitorEnter(Connection con, Email email, Operator operator, Subproject subproject)
      Will be called after a question changed the mode to monitored.
      HashMap<String,Object> postMonitorSend(Connection con, Email email, Operator operator, Subproject subproject)
      Is called after the email was sent.
      HashMap<String,Object> preMonitorEnter(Connection con, Email email, Operator operator, Subproject subproject)
      Is called before a question entered monitor mode.
      HashMap<String,Object> preMonitorSend(Connection con, Email email, Operator operator, Subproject subproject)
      Is called before an email exits the the operator mode and will be sent.

        con - - Connection of Database
        email - - Monitored email

      • preMonitorSend

        HashMap<String,Object> preMonitorSend(Connection con,
                                    Email email,
                                    Operator operator,
                                    Subproject subproject)
        Is called before an email exits the the operator mode and will be sent.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of Database
        email - monitored email
        operator - operator who sent the email
        subproject - subproject from which the email will be sent
        Returns:
        key PARAM_MONITOR_ACTION true if the mail may be sent, false otherwise
